mutants.code:
def longest_substring_of_unique_character(input_string, case_sensitive=False):
    max_count = 0
    count = 1
    max_substr = ''
    substr = input_string[0] if len(input_string) else ''
    for i in range(1, len(input_string)):
        cur_char = input_string[i]
        prev_char = input_string[i - 1]
        if not case_sensitive:
            cur_char = cur_char.lower()
            prev_char = prev_char.lower()
        if cur_char == prev_char:
            count += 1
            substr += input_string[i]
        else:
            if count > max_count:
                max_count = count
                max_substr = substr
            count = 1
            substr = input_string[i]
    if count > max_count:
        max_count = count
        max_substr = substr
    return max_substr

    max_substr = ''
    substr = input_string[0] if len(input_string) else ''
    for i in range(1, len(input_string)):
        cur_char = input_string[i]
        prev_char = input_string[i - 1]
        if not case_sensitive:
            cur_char = cur_char.lower()
            prev_char = prev_char.lower()
        if cur_char == prev_char:
            count += 1
            substr += input_string[i]
        else:
            if count > max_count:
                max_count = count
                max_substr = substr
            count = 2
            substr = input_string[i]
    if count > max_count:
        max_count = count
        max_substr = substr
    return max_substr
